comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:6.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/6.0
Build ID: 20110713171652

Steps to reproduce:

Closed the Firefox browser.


Actual results:

I closed the browser, after no longer needing it open, to re-open it a few(10-20) seconds later, when the browser triggered an alert/warning box stating that 'firefox is already open, but may not be responding.'

I have only experienced this with Firefox 6 Beta 2, but I haven't tried Beta 1. 


Expected results:

The browser should've re-opened normally. I had to kill the process in task manager to be able to re-open Firefox.
comments.author: frederickwright0@gmail.com

comments.author: tdowner@mozilla.com
comments.text: Have you tried with a fresh profile? http://support.mozilla.com/kb/Managing+profiles usually extensions are known to cause this
comments.creator: tdowner@mozilla.com
